trans-unit.source: The CmsRecipientCollection class represents a set of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: CmsRecipientCollection 클래스 집합을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: CmsRecipientCollection implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: CmsRecipientCollection 구현 하는 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The CmsRecipientCollection constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: CmsRecipientCollection 생성자의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The CmsRecipientCollection constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> class and adds the specified recipient.
trans-unit.target: CmsRecipientCollection 생성자의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 클래스 및 지정 된 받는 사람을 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> class that represents the specified CMS/PKCS #7 recipient.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> 지정한 CMS/PKCS #7 받는 사람을 나타내는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The CmsRecipientCollection constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> class and adds recipients based on the specified subject identifier and set of certificates that identify the recipients.
trans-unit.target: CmsRecipientCollection 생성자의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 클래스 및 지정 된 주체 식별자 및 받는 사람을 식별 하는 인증서의 집합에 따라 받는 사람을 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the type of subject identifier.
trans-unit.target: 멤버는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"> </xref> 주체 식별자의 형식을 지정 하는 열거형입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> collection that contains the certificates that identify the recipients.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> 수신자를 식별 하는 인증서가 포함 된 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds a recipient to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 받는 사람을 추가 하는 Add 메서드는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object that represents the recipient to add to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> 에 추가할 받는 사람을 나타내는 개체는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the method succeeds, the method returns an <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the zero-based position where the recipient is to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 메서드가 성공 하면 메서드가 반환는 <xref:System.Int32>받는 인 삽입 될&0;부터 시작 위치를 나타내는 값입니다.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: If the method fails, it throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 메서드가 실패 하면 예외가 throw 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: recipient is .
trans-unit.target: recipientis .

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection to an array.
trans-unit.target: CopyTo 메서드 복사본은 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션을 배열에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array> object to which the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection is to be copied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>개체는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 복사 하는 컬렉션.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` where the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection is copied.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스는&0;부터 시작 `array` 여기서는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션을 복사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - array is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: - array지정 된 요소를 보관할 만큼 크지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: - -or- - array does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: --또는-- array 차원의 적절 한 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is outside the range of elements in array.
trans-unit.target: index요소 범위를 벗어났습니다 array합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection to a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> array.
trans-unit.target: CopyTo 메서드 복사본은 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션에는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> objects where the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection is to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 배열을 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> 개체 위치는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 복사 하는 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index for the array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> objects in `array` to which the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection is copied.
trans-unit.target: 배열에 대 한&0;부터 시작 인덱스 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> 개체 `array` 입니다는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션을 복사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - array is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: - array지정 된 요소를 보관할 만큼 크지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: - -or- - array does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: --또는-- array 차원의 적절 한 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is outside the range of elements in array.
trans-unit.target: index요소 범위를 벗어났습니다 array합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Count property retrieves the number of items in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Count 속성에 있는 항목의 수를 검색 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>컬렉션의 항목 수를 나타내는 값입니다.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The GetEnumerator method returns a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: GetEnumerator 메서드가 반환 된 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"> </xref> 개체에 대 한는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"> </xref> 열거를 사용할 수 있는 개체는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The IsSynchronized property retrieves whether access to the collection is synchronized, or thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 속성 컬렉션에 대 한 액세스 동기화 되어 있는지 여부를 검색 IsSynchronized 또는 스레드로부터 안전 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which means that the collection is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 항상 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, 컬렉션 스레드로부터 안전 하지 않음을 의미 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which means that the collection is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>값 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, 즉, 컬렉션에 스레드로부터 안전 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The Item property retrieves the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 항목 속성 검색에서 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> 개체 컬렉션에서 지정 된 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>컬렉션의 인덱스를 나타내는 값입니다.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The index is zero based.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스는&0;부터 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> 지정된 된 인덱스에는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
trans-unit.target: 인수 값이 호출 된 메서드가 정의 된 대로 값의 허용 범위 밖에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The Remove method removes a recipient from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 수신자를 제거 하는 Remove 메서드는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> object that represents the recipient to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"> </xref> 컬렉션에서 제거할 수신자를 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: recipient is .
trans-unit.target: recipientis .

trans-unit.source: The SyncRoot property retrieves an <xref:System.Object> object used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: SyncRoot 속성 검색은 <xref:System.Object>개체에 대 한 액세스를 동기화 하는 데는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> object that is used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>에 대 한 액세스를 동기화 하는 데 사용 되는 개체는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The IEnumerable.GetEnumerator method returns a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: IEnumerable.GetEnumerator 메서드는 반환 된 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"> </xref> 개체에 대 한는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator"> </xref> 열거를 사용할 수 있는 개체는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.
